about_the_game:
This package includes 16 Lam Lam's characters emoji. Up to June in 2024, all income earned from this package would be used in Lam Lam Japanese localization. Afterwards, earnings will be used in future game development.

Where is the emoji
Please click to "library" and right click Lam Lam icon. Then choose "manage" and choose "browse the folder". Then the "ll emoji" folder should be found.
